title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 7.1 - Rating of examinations for positions under the jurisdiction of municipal civil service commissions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 7.1 - Rating of examinations for positions under the jurisdiction of municipal civil service commissions

State Regulations

The provisions of these rules and of the regulations of the
commissioner and of the department dealing with the rating of examinations
shall apply to any written examination prepared and rated by the department at
the request of a municipal commission pursuant to subdivision 2 of section
23
of the

Civil Service Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
7.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
